active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, analyze a recent real-world data breach (e.g., Equifax 2017). Debate: How would a Confidentiality Impact Assessment have changed the outcome? What misconceptions (e.g., confusing confidentiality with integrity) contributed to the failure? Support with NIST references.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
